triples.name: Chatbot
triples.relevance: The primary technology examined in the review for supporting language learning through conversational interaction.

triples.name: Language education
triples.relevance: The main domain where chatbots are evaluated as learning assistants.

triples.name: Natural language processing
triples.relevance: The underlying technology that enables chatbots to understand and generate natural language conversations with students.

triples.name: Grounded theory
triples.relevance: The inductive research methodology used to identify technological and pedagogical affordances from the reviewed studies.

triples.name: Personalization
triples.relevance: One of the key technological affordances identified in the review as enabled by chatbots for language learning.
